name: I Love Finding Cats & Pups
description:
I Love Finding Cats & Pups is a classic hidden object game set in beautiful scenes.



Search through them all to adopt and collect all the pawsome cats and pups! Play new mini games, solve fun puzzles, and collect all the adorable cats & pups!



Features

  • Find a great variety of cats and pups!
  • Explore beautiful hidden object locations.
  • Play over 20 fun mini games!
  • Collect and adopt all the adorable cats and pups!

Collector’s Edition

  • 6 extra locations
  • 12 minigames
  • A set of wallpapers
  • Music player.
  • Additional cats and pups that can’t wait to meet you!
  • Meet the developers’ cats and pups!
